sentence.Network_en: Humanitarianism is apt to be forgotten when the balloon goes up.

sentence.Network_en: We must heal the wounded , rescue the dying, practicing revolutionary humanitarianism.

sentence.Network_en: Doctors should heal the wounded , rescue the dying, and practice humanitarianism.
sentence.Network_cn: 大夫要救死扶伤, 实行人道主义.
